question: Which is the country of origin of the music rock band "The Sugarcubes"?
explanation: Iceland is the country of origin of the music rock band "The Sugarcubes". The Sugarcubes were an Icelandic alternative rock band from Reykjavik formed in 1986 and disbanded in 1992. For most of their career, the band consisted of Bjork (vocals, keyboards), Einar Orn Benediktsson (vocals, trumpet), Thor Eldon (guitar), Bragi Olafsson (bass), Margret "Magga" Ornolfsdottir (keyboards) and Sigtryggur Baldursson (drums).
